headline.main: Lawmakers Urge Commodities Agency to Keep Plan to Limit Futures Contracts

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Lawmakers criticized a report, by a committee composed largely of representatives from the energy and trading industries, that advised the C.F.T.C. to drop proposed limits.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers criticized a report, by a committee composed largely of representatives from the energy and trading industries, that advised the C.F.T.C. to drop proposed limits.
